website_summaries.verdict: Adding contemporary appeal to Van’s very first sneaker is the Gum Authentic. Retaining its predecessor’s iconic silhouette, this shoe brings a new level of awesome to the lineage by incorporating gum soles to match with fun and fresh colorways.The sneaker's vintage appeal, time-tested comfort, and excellent grip make this affordable sneaker worth including in your to-buy sneaker list.
pros: Several purchasers have liked the Vans Gum Authentic shoes so much that they bought numerous pairs of them
Longtime fans of the Authentic silhouette have shared that they felt nostalgic when they purchased this model
The majority of the shoe users find it to be very comfortable
This shoe’s iconic silhouette is deemed to be timeless and stylishly sleek by most reviewers
This iteration of Vans Authentic comes in a number of colorways
It is lightweight, based on some commenters’ opinions
Few wearers have mentioned that the shoe provides adequate support for walking and all-day wear
The sneaker’s canvas upper is breathable and helps keep feet dry
Like other Vans sneakers with gum soles, it provides excellent grip on and off the board
cons: A lady reviewer has wished that there were more sizes available
The canvas upper of the Vans Gum Authentic does not last long if used for skateboarding

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes. Classic 80's style
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes. Classic 80's style. I feel so radical with these kicks. Problem is they are a bit tighter / narrower than another pair of Vans I have. I probably should of sent them back and exchanged for 1/2 size larger, but didn't so I'll live with it I guess.
customer_reviews.author: DetroitJake

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous and stylish checkerboard shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my granddaughter. She absolutely loved everything about them.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Kidd

customer_reviews.title: A tiny bit narrow.
customer_reviews.text: These are great Vans. They're a little narrow, but that's typical for this type of shoe. They're sharp looking
customer_reviews.author: Jason McCullough

customer_reviews.title: so damn cute
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes!!! The checkerboard pattern is so cute and a great addition to my wardrobe. I've even worn them with my scrubs to work & they are comfortable for 12+ hrs.
customer_reviews.author: J. Temple

customer_reviews.title: These run a bit narrow, even in wider sizes.
customer_reviews.text: Even though I ordered a wider size they are a bit narrow. I am overall happy with these shoes and will make for a cool comfy shoe for this summer.
customer_reviews.author: cyberbullet

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely loved these shoes when I wanted them when I was ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved these shoes when I wanted them when I was younger. Now when I tried to find them online & in stores they're almost extinct! Luckily I happen to came across Amazon & find that they had a 11.5 size with only one in stock. Normally 11 is just right but when I got the 11.5 and tried it on, it was just a tiny tad bit narrow but other than that everything was good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classics
customer_reviews.text: What is there so say there Vans, I own the slip on classics so it was nice to own a pair of classic black and white checker shoes. There true to fit on least for vans. Great shoe super happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jadeinfamous

customer_reviews.title: a bit small
customer_reviews.text: Go a half size bigger I wear 9.5 and a 10 fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Johnson

customer_reviews.title: These Vans are Gnarly!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are more about looks than comfort, but I don't regret buying them. The arch support is not the best, but once I got them broken in, they are pretty comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Hunter

customer_reviews.title: great communication, very affordable
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, item as described, great communication, very affordable. Very satisfied with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... buy checkered ones they are fake and look very bad.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy checkered ones they are fake and look very bad.
customer_reviews.author: daniel cohen

product_meta.title: Vans U Authentic, Unisex Trainer
feature_bullets: Canvas, lace-up deck shoe with Vans classic Off the Wall vulcanized outsole
